## common-router package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DataRouter](./common-router.datarouter.md) | Special implementation of router that allows routing with sending complex data to routed component |
|  [DataRouterData](./common-router.datarouterdata.md) | Class that is used for obtaining complex routed data |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ComponentRedirectRoute(redirectFrom, redirectTo, pathMatchFull)](./common-router.componentredirectroute.md) | Defines redirection route to component's route on which is this decorator applied |
|  [ComponentRoute(route)](./common-router.componentroute.md) | Defines route for component on which is this decorator applied |
|  [extractRoutes(components)](./common-router.extractroutes.md) | Extracts route definitions from components if routes are set using decorator ComponentRoute |
|  [ModuleRoutes(routedComponents, options)](./common-router.moduleroutes.md) | Registers routes for module to which is attached |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ComponentRouteChildren](./common-router.componentroutechildren.md) | Extended route with possibility to extract children from components |
|  [ModuleRoutesOptions](./common-router.moduleroutesoptions.md) | Describes options for ModuleRoutes decorator |
|  [RedirectRouteDecoratedComponent](./common-router.redirectroutedecoratedcomponent.md) | Extended type with redirect route definition |
|  [RouteDecoratedComponent](./common-router.routedecoratedcomponent.md) | Extended type with route definition |
